dt: {bc}the art or practice that seeks to foresee or foretell future events or discover hidden knowledge usually by the interpretation of {d_link|omens|omen} or by the aid of supernatural powers

et: Middle English {it}divinacioun{/it}, from Latin {it}divination-, divinatio{/it}, from {it}divinare{/it} {dx_ety}see {dxt|divine:3||}{/dx_ety}
shortdef: the art or practice that seeks to foresee or foretell future events or discover hidden knowledge usually by the interpretation of omens or by the aid of supernatural powers
